description: The casualty was brought out of the house by firefighters, but later died at the scene.
title: One person dead following St Albans house fire
title_page: One person dead following St Albans house fire - BBC News
maintext:
A person has died following a house blaze in Hertfordshire.
Four fire engines were sent to Lower Paxton Road in St Albans just before 17:00 GMT on Wednesday.
A person was brought out of the house by firefighters to be given medical attention, but died at the scene.
Hertfordshire Fire and Rescue Service said it would be working with police on its investigation.
